game.name: ZooKeeper
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Become a Zoo Keeper, manage and build the zoo of your childhood dreams! Take care of the animals and create ideal conditions for them. Grow your zoo, add extraordinary species and prepare amazing attractions for visitors.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Become a Zoo Keeper, manage and build the zoo of your childhood dreams! Take care of the animals and create ideal conditions for them. Grow your zoo, add extraordinary species and prepare amazing attractions for visitors.
